scripts.dev: nodemon --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("extensionless", pathToFileURL("./"));' src/server.js
scripts.start: node --quiet--import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("extensionless", pathToFileURL("./"));' src/server.js
